item.title: Flytipping on Canada Estate, 24th November
item.description:
There has been flytipping of fridges that were reported nearly two weeks ago and additional waste has been added to it. This needs clearing as a matter of urgency
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Canada Estate, Rotherhithe, Greater London

item.title: Dog fouling, 24th November
item.description:
There is a large pile of poo to left of 2a Garnham Street--I don't normally report fouling, but this is an unusually large pile. Please can someone pick it up? Thanks so much.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Garnham Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaf debris blocking drain, 24th November
item.description:
Please can you clear the pile of rotting leaves that blocks the street drain outside 37 Farnaby Road. I have cleared the drain and kerb today (24/11). The mechanized street cleaner often does not get close to the kerb because of parked cars and the leaves turn into mud/mulch which blocks the drain completely. My sympathies with the road cleaning team at this time of year!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farnaby Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole exposing Gas pipe, 24th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Worsley Bridge Road, New Beckenham, Greater London

item.title: Rubbish dumped, 24th November
item.description:
Bags of rubbish dumped in a favourite spot for the fly tippers. Now blocking access to the pavement so wheelchair and pushchair users along with people with mobility difficulty will have to walk into the road to get past. Not safe.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brookdene Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light out in Amberley Road, 24th November
item.description:
Light out in Amberley Road which is causing residents to not be able to see as it is pitch black - resident little worried as lots of vulnerable people up their road and risk of burglaries...please can this be looked into
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Amberley Road, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
